mapper.select: SELECT u.uid, u.nick_name nickName, u.pic_uid picUid, COUNT(b.uid) blogCount, SUM(b.click_count) clickCount, SUM(b.like_count) likeCount, CASE WHEN COALESCE(SUM(f.uid),0) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isFollow FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_blog b ON u.uid = b.author AND b.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN t_follow f ON u.uid = f.target_user_uid AND f.user_uid = #{loginUserUid} AND f.STATUS = 1 WHERE u.STATUS = 1 AND u.uid = #{userUid}
